Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-14177 affecting package php for versions less than 8.1.34-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-14177 affecting package php for versions less than 8.1.34-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package php is earlier than 8.1.34-1, affected by CVE-2025-14177
